alert.note: Alert for Giles; Montgomery (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:11PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Giles and Montgomery Counties and the northeastern City of Radford through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prices Fork, or near Newport, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Blacksburg... Christiansburg... Radford... Newport... Shawsville... Prices Fork... and Mc Donalds Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
